CustomField.description: The name of the SObject that this Page Assignment is for. Can also be an arbitrary name, e.g. "SiteHome", for running Skuid from the component, e.g. <skuid:page objecttype="SiteHome"> component with
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Which SObject, or other scenario, will this Page Assignment be used for? Could also be an arbitrary name, such as 'SiteHome', for running Skuid from the Visualforce Component.
CustomField.label: Object Type
